lexUnit.name: arrange.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: put in a neat, attractive, or required order.

sentence.text: Arranging them in a curved shape , I used a small fern , some gorse , a few ` Canary Bird " roses and some pansies .
He arranged them in a Noah row as he talked .
Arrange rice in a ring and place chicken in the centre .
Arrange fish in a single layer in the tin .
Burger deftly arranged the creases in his trousers .
